Articles.Content:
Tonight at 6:00 PM EST, Framerate Games(which you may have heard of) will be doing a livestream on Twitch! We will be rescuing Hans, Jeb and Bob in one go! Don't miss it! Also, be sure to let us know if it's working. We've had problems with Twitch in the past.

Watch it right here!

Edited April 30, 2014 by The Jedi Master
Shouldn't this go in fan works or something?

Shouldn't this go in fan works or something?

I saw a Twitch thing in General once, and it didn't get moved. It's the mods decision, though.
Good luck streaming! Yeah it should go in fan works but it gets more views here. Which the forum is trying to change ~

Good luck, perhaps I will watch too.

But on international forums, you should post you're timezone when you are posting a time. For example it's almost 21pm where I live, so I have no idea when the stream will actually begin.

Good luck, perhaps I will watch too.

But on international forums, you should post you're timezone when you are posting a time. For example it's almost 21pm where I live, so I have no idea when the stream will actually begin.

It is in EST. Should have mentioned that.

It is in EST. Should have mentioned that.

Thanks! Then I will watch this stream.
Oh, Jedi if you ever need a random person with fairly low frame rate to stream you can call me.
One hour, fifteen minutes to go! It's always been my Twitch dream to have a chat to respond to, so please feel free to comment!
Only half an hour to go! The test flight of our ship went swimmingly!
We are now live on twitch.tv/framerate_games come and watch us save three kerbals!
We've saved Hans from orbit and now on to the moon
We've saved Hans from orbit and now on to the moon
Just as I decide to visit the forum... Maybe I'll view the highlights later.
The recap is now on YouTube. I'll post the videos later.
You can find the recap in the Framerate Games main thread!
